name: Nibaran Das
content: Prof. Nibaran Das Prof. Nibaran Das Professor, Department of Computer Science & Engineering, Jadavpur University About Me About Me Nibaran Das is a full professor with ten years of post-PhD experience in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at Jadavpur University. His study focuses on the applications of machine learning and deep learning approaches to Document image Analysis and Microscopy Image Analysis. He has authored or coauthored over 150 journal articles, conference proceedings, and book chapters in the fields of pattern Recognition and image processing. Name: Prof. Nibaran Das Website: Prof. Nibaran Das Phone: 03324572407 City: Kolkata-700032 West Bengal India Degree: PHD Email: nibaran.das@jadavpuruniversity.in Expert In Deep Learning, Patter Recognition, Image processing, Artificial Intelligence, Optical Character Recognition and Microscopy Image Analysis. Years of experience From 2005 News News December, 2022: Masters Student Snehasis Sahu from DVLP Research Group has achieved University Madel for placing First Class First in MTCT(2019-2022) course. December, 2022: PhD Scholars Somenath Kuiry and Soumyajyoti Dey of DVLP Research group have received travel grant for participating IndoML,2022 July, 2021: BE/Btech(Final Year or Pre Final Year) internship positions available funded by SERB. EXPERIENCE EXPERIENCE Notable Achievements Achievements Best Volunteer of IEEE Kolkata Section for the year 2015 by IEEE Kolkata Section-2016 Received 3rd excellence award in the summer school of International Document Information Processing School (IDIPS2016), Samos, Greece, 4-8 July, 2016 From the Organizer of the summer school. The visit was supported by TEQIP-II Program of Government of India under through Jadavpur University Visit University of Evora, Portugal for research at staff level under EMMA-WEST Erasmus Mundus mobility program by European Union From 18-05-2014 to 20-6-2014 EMMA-WEST Post-Doctoral Fellowship at university of Evora by European Union From 12th October 2013 to 11th January 2014 EMMA-WEST Post-Doctoral Fellowship at university of Evora by European Union From 26th November 2012 to 20th February 2013 Education Ph.D. 2012 Jadavpur University M.E. 2005 Jadavpur University B.Tech 2003 Kalyani Government Engineering College (University of Kalyani) Professional Experience Full Professor 2021 - Present Jadavpur University Associate Professor 2018 - 2021 Jadavpur University Assistant Professor 2006 - 2018 Jadavpur University Lecturer 2005 - 2006 Techno India Research interests Deep Learning Patter Recognition Image processing Artificial Intelligence Optical Character Recognition.
